knimeNode.name: OpenNLP NER Model Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads OpenNLP models for named entity tagging.

fullDescription.intro:
Reads OpenNLP models for named entity tagging. This node can be used to make externally trained models available in KNIME. The models then can be used with the OpenNLP NE Tagger node.
A list of pre-trained OpenNLP models can be found here:
http://opennlp.sourceforge.net/models-1.5/
(Note: Only Name Finder models can be read with this node.)

ports.outPort: An output port containing the OpenNLP NER model.
